text: The 2011 Czech Republic motorcycle Grand Prix was the eleventh round of the 2011 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season. It took place on the weekend of 12–14 August 2011 at the Masaryk Circuit located in Brno. Andrea Dovizioso, Casey Stoner and Marco Simoncelli, celebrating on the podium after finishing second, first and third at the MotoGP race. ==MotoGP classification== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" !
